Title: Uttarer Sur
Writer: Shahneoyaj Cacoly (script), Shahneoyaj Cacoly (screenplay), Shahneoyaj Cacoly (dialogue)
Actors: Meghla, Utpal, Lucy Tripti Gomes, Aditto Alam
Plot: Life story of a street singer and his little daughter who live from hand to mouth by singing and their day-to-day experiences while performing in the streets.
